Posts.Content: May 30, 2013 10:00PM missLori wrote: I so know what your going through, just to ease your mind the Biospy did not hurt, your just sore after.  The waiting well that is the worst part of all.  I had my biospy on Tuesday and Im praying they have some answers tomrrow.  Did you get a copy of the reports , that is one thing I made sure to get is copies of everything because sometimes you want 2nd reads.  I had two reads.  What was your BIRAD score
Posts.Title: scared mtulneg chrissyb

Posts.Content: missLori wrote: I just turned 40 and had my first Mammogram the tests came back that they found a Nodule 11x7x5 mm so I had spot compression done and Ultra sound came back bad again, their was shadowing and Hyperechoic nodule.  my GYN nurse called and sent me to a Beast Center, I went there and had a core biospsy done, before biospy they said they wanted to look at my lymph nodeds via ultra sound, in which dr said they looked good.   while getting  my biospy the Dr was having a really hard time and kept saying its so low I cant get to it then said what is this i get through it(meanwhile im freaking out)  and now I have to wait all I can say is im sooooo scared when i asked what are the chances of this being B9 he did not answer, when i left they said they would call and dont call them until friday.  im so scared, has this happened to anyone? Posts.Content: missLori wrote: Had BX on Tuesday, I'm losing my mind esp, because of the radiologist who was freaking out on my biospy, if was sayting its so low and I cant get through it he pooped the gun thing like 12 times and dug around forever im so sore.  my birads was a 4, they did do an us to check lymph nodes is this because they thinks its cancer cant stop crying and doctor said dont call them unless i have not heard from them by friday. would any of you wait Log in to post a reply
